Posts.Content: hi I am starting EC Friday but I have been reading on this site most ladies are having FEC with same Tnbc and staging . What's the difference ??? . Also I am 5 weeks since lumpectomy and sentinal node biopsy and breast still tender and aches at end of the day with pain in shoulder and back . Still lumpy and hard around scar . Should I be worried ?  Terrified but trying to stay positive for chemo xxx
Posts.Title: EC vs FEC

Posts.Content: Aww thank you genny I am going to ask tomorrow I have to go and have a look around unit and speak to nurses .. I feel like I'm missing out on the F ha ha I know it's sounds funny but I am a real worrier wish I wasnt ... I am going to get some bio oil too .. My breast looks horrible my nipple points upwards now since they drained fluid from it .. All misshapen and a cup size smaller .. But hey that's the least of my problems ... onwards and upwards xxx
Posts.Title: EC vs FEC

Posts.Content: Hi I am 2 weeks post op breast lumpectomy and sentinel node biopsy . I am in quite a bit of pain with what I think is cording . It's starts under my arm around back of arm going down arm ... Back of my shoulder is most painful ...  Any advise I go for my hospital appointment Friday should I ring bcn ?  Thank you
Posts.Title: Painful cording

Posts.Content: hi again  had my first chemo Friday was really sick but got over that but since Sunday I have been in agony with aches over my body so painful to touch . Feeling really unwell Christies say it's a side effect of neulasta injection .. Has anyone felt this bad and when will it go away .. It's absolutely floored me
Posts.Title: Neulasta

Posts.Content: Hi ladies feeling much better today I've decided that the benefits out way the disadvantage s .. So I'm going to carry on if its 3 days out of 3 weeks I think I can just about cope with that .. I am going to try what moomey said next time give it a go  I felt great today got up went shopping come back and I'm exhausted going to have 40 winks hopefully recharge my battery ..  I would be lost with this site thanks girls xxxxx
Posts.Title: Neulasta

Posts.Content: Hi everyone  just got back from my oncology appointment and my mind is all over the place ... I thought cause I had triple negative ductal breast cancer that it was a better to have ( well none are better ) but I'm a bit shaken to find it is more aggressive and can travel through blood ... I can't take it all in . My lymph nodes are clear and have told me I have clear margins ... Now my mind is focusing on blood overthinking it all .. I have been very possotive but this has knocked me back a bit .. Chemo to start next week with EC and then taxol for 9 weeks.... Was thinking of cold cap but can't make my mind up so many decisions to make .. Anyone in the same boat ... I'm on a struggling day today any help would be appreciated . Xxxxx
Posts.Title: Triple negative ductal carcinoma

Posts.Content: Hi Julia  i am crying reading this probably because u have picked me up .. I am grade 3 and Tumor was 3 cm . Today oncologist told me they found traces in my blood really tweaked me out .. Now I think cancer is travelling all over my body I'm such a drama queen .. I'm up and down like a roller coaster . Bn going to speak to oncologist tomorrow . I really need to be thinking more positive .. Has all your treatment finished now .., u have made me feel so much better thank you
Posts.Title: Triple negative ductal carcinoma

Posts.Content: Thank you again . I have just ordered how to beat triple negative cancer of Amazon after reading some stories on here . Hopefully it could help .. Thank you again and well done xxxxxxx delighted for u xxxxxx
Posts.Title: Triple negative ductal carcinoma
